description: Rusted Moss is a metroidvania featuring an elastic physics-based grappling hook.

AlphaRelease.description:
Alpha release of the Rusted Moss apworld for Archipelago
Info about this randomizer: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/en_Rusted_Moss.md

Installation/usage instructions:
1. Apply the data.bps patch file to the data.win file in your Rusted Moss installation (I use https://www.marcrobledo.com/RomPatcher.js/)
2. Extract the ArchipelagoRustedMossClient.zip
3. Run ArchipelagoRustedMossClient.exe in the extracted folder and connect to a slot
4. Open Rusted Moss and create a new file. Mod was only tested in speedrun mode, but others _should_ work

More extensive and thorough setup documentation can be viewed here: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/setup_en.md
AlphaRelease.title: Rusted Moss Archipelago Alpha v0.1.0

v0.1.1-alpha.description:
Changelog:
- Fix player receiving infinite grappling hook not being saved to save file
- Sniper costs no mana and does no damage if the player does not have enough mana to fire it

Info about this randomizer: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/en_Rusted_Moss.md
More extensive and thorough setup documentation can be viewed here: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/setup_en.md

Installation/usage instructions:
Apply the data.bps patch file to the data.win file in your Rusted Moss installation (I use https://www.marcrobledo.com/RomPatcher.js/)
Extract the ArchipelagoRustedMossClient.zip
Run ArchipelagoRustedMossClient.exe in the extracted folder and connect to a slot
Open Rusted Moss and create a new file. Mod was only tested in speedrun mode, but others should work

If you have installed a prior version, make sure you are applying the patch file to an unmodified copy of the data.win file
v0.1.1-alpha.title: Rusted Moss Archipelago Alpha v0.1.1

v0.1.2-alpha.description:
Changelog: 
- Fix Titania Piece being found in the tea party room
- Fix logic for transitions within the same room being applied both ways

Info about this randomizer: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/en_Rusted_Moss.md
More extensive and thorough setup documentation can be viewed here: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/setup_en.md

Installation/usage instructions:
Apply the data.bps patch file to the data.win file in your Rusted Moss installation (I use https://www.marcrobledo.com/RomPatcher.js/)
Extract the ArchipelagoRustedMossClient.zip
Run ArchipelagoRustedMossClient.exe in the extracted folder and connect to a slot
Open Rusted Moss and create a new file. Mod was only tested in speedrun mode, but others should work

If you have installed a prior version, make sure you are applying the patch file to an unmodified copy of the data.win file
v0.1.2-alpha.title: Rusted Moss Archipelago Alpha v0.1.2

v0.1.3-alpha.description:
Changelog:
- Fix wrong flags getting sent
- Fix ending d not being able to be triggered
- Changed how teleport back to start works, less convenient but more stable
- Added patch command to client
- Added downpatching instructions

Info about this randomizer: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/en_Rusted_Moss.md
More extensive and thorough setup documentation can be viewed here: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/setup_en.md
v0.1.3-alpha.title: Rusted Moss Archipelago Alpha v0.1.3

v0.1.4-alpha.description:
Changelog:
- Yaml option to choose which version of maya to fight in the living quarters
- Yaml option to enable deathlink (can be toggled in the client as well)
- Yaml option to discount shop prices
- Added text to version number in the bottom left of the main menu indicating the game is modded

Info about this randomizer: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/en_Rusted_Moss.md
More extensive and thorough setup documentation can be viewed here: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/setup_en.md
v0.1.4-alpha.title: Rusted Moss Archipelago Alpha v0.1.4

v0.1.5-alpha.description:
Changelog:

- Overhaul to logic to utilize regions instead of events (credit: @qwint)
- Above rework fixed infinite grapple location being accessible without titania pieces (credit: @qwint)
- Logic fix which previously allowed access to Lab Fae Silver (Left) without hitting the required target (credit: @qwint)
- Logic fix which previously allowed access to Living Quarters Flag without Grenade or Rocket Launcher

Info about this randomizer: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/en_Rusted%20Moss.md
More extensive and thorough setup documentation can be viewed here: https://github.com/dgrossmann144/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/rusted_moss/docs/setup_en.md
v0.1.5-alpha.title: Rusted Moss Archipelago Alpha v0.1.5
